name: unit-testing
description: Production-grade test automation and debugging with 3 execution modes (quick/standard/enterprise), AI-driven RCA, comprehensive examples, and TDD excellence. Features iterative test fixing, automated test generation with scientific computing support (JAX, NumPy, PyTorch), and 8 comprehensive external documentation files (~5,858 lines). v1.0.3 optimizes both commands (50.6% reduction: 2,112→1,044 lines) and registers the e2e-testing-patterns skill.
